description:
Since r781, get_metadata calls upon a new _image_ec2_id to convert ramdisk_id and kernel_id into an ec2-like ID.

However, if either of them are unset (which is completely valid), _image_ec2_id fails (because calling int() on an empty string doesn't work).
title: Meta-data service broken if ramdisk or kernel is missing (which is valid!)

comments.content:
Since r781, get_metadata calls upon a new _image_ec2_id to convert ramdisk_id and kernel_id into an ec2-like ID.

However, if either of them are unset (which is completely valid), _image_ec2_id fails (because calling int() on an empty string doesn't work).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren
